text: Maintenance of voluntary accreditation requires a minimum of 20 hours of QTC registered PD and 80 hours of teacher identified PD over 5yrs.

Keep records of communication that demonstrates your high ethical standards regarding privacy of student information.
APST 7 #accreditation

Evaluate school-based professional programs with colleagues to assess the effectiveness of teacher professional learning activities.
APST 6

Work with colleagues to assess prior learning to determine the starting point of learning and teaching programs.
APST 5 #accreditation

Use professional learning materials to show how you have implemented, revised or maintained school based student welfare processes.
